images.title: Caroline Flatt / Rollesby Broad from the Sailing Club jetty
images.caption: Rollesby Broad from the Sailing Club jetty. The Broad is one of the Trinity Broads of Norfolk.

description: Rollesby Broad is located just to the east of the Norfolk village of Rollesby. There's a parking area on the A road in between the broad and the adjacent Ormesby Broad. You can enjoy a short walk along a footpath with information boards, benches and a fine view across the water. If you cross the road there's a pavement running along Ormesby Broad, so you can turn it into a pleasant little circular stroll. Just to the south there's Fleggburgh and Filby Broad where you can enjoy a longer circular walk around the neighbouring village.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: Near the car park there's The Waterside for some post walk refreshment. There's a lovely cafe here with views over Rollesby Broad to enjoy.

display_address: Main Road, Ormesby St. Michael, Ormesby Saint Michael, Great Yarmouth, Norfolk, England, NR29 3LT, United Kingdom
